title: Bitcoin, Global Macro, the case for DeFi being additive to Bitcoin with Raoul Pal: Episode 11
description:
Will Clemente and cohost Sam Chwarynzski discuss global macro, Bitcoin, and how DeFi relates to Bitcoin with Raoul Pal for our weekly interview Podcast/YouTube channel series. Can now find our podcast on Spotify, Apple, and Google Podcasts as well!  


Raoul's twitter: twitter.com/RaoulGMI
dc:creator: Joe Burnett
